Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute at Racine/Taylor
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted WB: Harrison, Jefferson, Van Buren, Loomis and Harrison: EB: Harrison, Loomis, Jackson, Des Plaines and Harrison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Racine/Taylor.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Jefferson, Van Buren, Loomis and Harrison.

Eastbound buses will operate via Harrison, Loomis, Jackson, Des Plaines and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at 93rd/Cyde
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Jeffery, 95th, Paxton and 93rd due to street blockage near 93rd/ Clyde.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 93rd, Jeffery, 95th, Paxton and 93rd due to street blockage near 93rd/ Clyde.

Allow extra travel time.
